resources.string: Hungry? Let\'s Get You Some Pizzas
Please click BACK again to exit
Location permission is needed for app to fetch data
Call permission is needed to call the number
Oops! something went wrong, it is recommended that you restart the app.
Unable to detect network connection, please check your internet
Unable to detect your location, please check your location settings
Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.
select * from local.search where query=\'pizza\'and latitude= %1$s and longitude=%2$s
